narrative.title: Littorio Division - 1942Q3
narrative.situation: Italian Armored Division deployed in North Africa during 1942Q3.
narrative.objectives: Mobile armored exploitation and breakthrough operations in desert warfare. Combined arms coordination of tanks, motorized infantry, and self-propelled artillery.
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Desert mobility with tracked and wheeled vehicles
Motorized Bersaglieri for combined arms operations
